release-labels.name: release-major
release-labels.description: Indicates a major breaking change will be introduced

release-labels.name: release-minor
release-labels.description: Indicates a minor feature will be added

release-labels.name: release-patch
release-labels.description: Indicates a patch to existing code will be applied

release-labels.name: no-release
release-labels.description: Indicates no user-facing code will be introduced
